website_summaries.verdict: If you need something a little smaller than the typical oversized towel, take a look at the variety of sizes RainLeaf offers.
pros: A microfiber towel with a suede-like feel on the skin
Antibacterial and quick-drying with a hanging loop
Buyer gets a choice of sizes and colors
cons: Towels may bleed, so wash before using for the first time
May arrive with a chemical smell

customer_reviews.title: Great pack, travel or camp towel.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice microfiber towel. Just a hint... Even if you think you need the largest size, you probably don't. I purchased the largest and it is basically a twin bed sheet. For those not accustom to drying with one of these, it's more of a patting dry than a rub. It's very absorbent and dries fast. There is a small pocket w/zipper in one corner for storage of small items and surprisingly I haven't had issues with the zipper while drying off.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Received a defective product.. :(
customer_reviews.text: So I bought a 40x72 inch towel for my trip to Miami. We were out on the beach and when I opened it, I took it out and it looked like 2 ends of a small rag and the entire middle portion was cut out... I was extremely shocked and disappointed. I was left wet/cold and towel-less. :( I'm sure this could've been a great product, buttt I got a defective one... Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: feeebz

customer_reviews.title: Not colorfast...orange is still running after three washes.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. I ordered the orange and after three washings with laundry detergent, the color is still running. May try to return it.
customer_reviews.author: kendon

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for camping/backpacking
customer_reviews.text: So lightweight. Dries ridiculously quick. This is perfect for camping/backpacking. The large size towel was big enough to wrap around my entire body. I'm 5'3, 125 lbs. It has a little hook on the corner that you can fasten and unfasten so you could just tie it up to something and let it hang out and dry for a bit if it needs it. Just an awesome little thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ismary

customer_reviews.title: Light & thirsty.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this RainLeaf Antibacterial Microfiber Towel for a camping trip by motorcycle. This was the perfect size for both packing AND for drying off after taking a campground shower. It is surprisingly "thirsty" for such a compact item.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Quick Drying and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 of these towels, in successive sizes. The first two I use for swimming. I've been so pleased with them that I purchased the largest size for after the shower. The towels dry me quickly and thoroughly, which is very useful to me when I'm in a hurry to shower and go out. The towels themselves also dry quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy P. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Soft, quick drying bit of wonderfulness.
customer_reviews.text: I love these towels, and I use them for far more than travel because I love that they are super soft and that they dry in record time! They are good to keep anywhere one might want a quick and easy clean-up, being of your person or your vehicle. This size is ideal for me as it folds up and fits into its tiny pouch and takes up virtually no room.
customer_reviews.author: E. McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Smells like Petroleum
customer_reviews.text: Smells like a petroleum product, even after one wash cycle. Washing again to try to remove the odor. I have purchased several different brands of microfiber towels (we have two dogs and a pool) and have never had this issue before. Would not buy this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Buy elsewhere!
customer_reviews.text: Smells like a brand new tire no matter how many washes it goes through. Will never use it on my body with that smell. High expectations, but a waste of money. Purchased a competitor's for same price much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff ;) Love the loops with snaps!
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff ;) Smooth, drys fast, has snaps on the loops, and I dig the bags with handles. I'd suggest the 30x60 or 40x72 as a full bath/sprawling towel, but the 24x48 does wrap around me.
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: Was going on a trip and read that these towels come in handy. Instead of getting the big one, I got the extra small size for my purse. We were in a humid environment and I loved being able to use this to wipe my brow and whatever else. Once you get used to the feel of microfiber it's no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: Love this towel!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this towel! I ordered one of the smaller sizes to use to dry my curly hair. Microfiber towels produce less frizz than regular towels, and I noticed an immediate difference. The towel washes well, though the wash instructions say to wash it in cold water -- FYI if you don't do a lot of cold wash. I've found that this dries my hair quickly and holds a lot of moisture. This is exactly what I hoped for, and I will be a repeat customer when I'm ready for a replacement in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Pros!...and cons
customer_reviews.text: I certainly can't fault this towel for being compact/light weight. It is very absorbent and sand/dirt does not easily stick to it. It's exactly what I was looking for. But... Durability, not so much. After 4 uses and 1 washing, the edge stitching is coming apart. And on a personal note, I was excited to support an American company by purchasing this product, only to receive it and realize the towel is made in China. I've seen this same towel sold by other sellers for a lower cost. Not a huge issue, just my own personal beef. That being said, this is going to be a permanent addition to my hiking backpack until it completely dies.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin C

customer_reviews.title: Hurts to use.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what it is about the towel, but my skin breaks out when I use it. In the humid climate of where I live, I only use microfiber towels, and needed a new one to replace my ratty one I've had for years now. This one I can't use due to the breaking out. Not sure what makes this one different from other brands that I have used in the past. It does dry quick though, quicker than my other towels. I is thicker, as well and feels nice. It just breaks me out.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Best travel towel ever.
customer_reviews.text: I took this towel on a 2 week trip through Austria and Slovakia. I am SO glad I had this thing. It was perfect for what I needed if for, it didn't take up much space, and it dried SUPER quick. If you are a backpacker, or even just a casual traveler, this thing is made for you! Also, the lime green made it VERY easy for me to find my towel in my bag quickly.
customer_reviews.author: brandon short

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.  Absorbs very little.  Poor return policy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item expecting it would be absorbent, not like a terry cloth towel, but like a microfiber cloth. It is very soft, but unfortunately it doesn't absorb much of anything. Not wanting to give up, I thought I would keep it simply to dry drinking glasses, straight out of the dishwasher, but it did not do a good job at that either. I returned the item. I'm disappointed it didn't work out. I'm also disappointed that the 3rd party vendor refunds only 80% of the price even within 30 days and even tho the product didn't work. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieeQQ

customer_reviews.title: Works, depending on color you choose
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these, different colors. The purple one is not absorbing water any where near as well as the green one and is leaking the purple dye out. The green one is perfect, quick drying, absorbent and wonderful, but the purple one is a mess, takes forever to dry, and fades. Not sure why there's a difference between the two as the only difference.os the color.
customer_reviews.author: Bre Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Best Towel for someone looking to travel light!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this towel for my trip to Jamaica and used it every day. It works really well for drying off and even dries itself pretty quickly (usually was dry by the time I got to my next destination during the day). Would definitely recommend to someone looking to travel light. The only drawback is the size large is a bit smaller than I expected, I'd recommend the XL for sure. I'm 6ft and it was a little tough to lay on while on the beach, but not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Anderson

customer_reviews.title: A great towel for the gym
customer_reviews.text: When I started working out again a couple of months ago, I went looking for a good towel that wouldn't take up too much space in my gym bag. And this one definitely fits the bill. When I got it, I was a bit dubious that something so thin could actually absorb any meaningful amount of water without becoming instantly soaked. Boy was I surprised the first time I used it! It worked GREAT! And once I'm done showering, it fits nicely into an outside mesh pocket on my gym bag. If you pack EVERYTHING you need into your gym bag like I do, you'll definitely appreciate the compactness of this microfiber towel.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Really cool!
customer_reviews.text: In my gym bag for when I go to VASA and decide to use the pools. The bag it came in is nice but only usefull if you have maid service to wash it and refold it to fit. Took a plastic grocery bag with to facility to put the wet towel and swin suit in for the trip home. But the instruction are right on - blot dry. Liked the larger size, didn't think the smaller one would be able to dry off with after showering. Would be nice to have a little hanging loop in one corner so it can be hung up after drying off, but not a big deal!
customer_reviews.author: John N Lasker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling. Lightweight, fold small!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this towel. I bought two, one for me and one for a friend for our trip through Europe for 6 weeks. I got XL towels and they are really large but pack up so small it's sort of amazing. They dry very quick and also absorb a lot. It is so lightweight they are perfect for traveling. The material kind of weirded me out at first, it's not typical towel material but I got used to it. I so reccomend these towels for anyone! I probably could have gotten away with a large towel but feel very comfortable in the XL
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Love It! Beach Friendly!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight; pretty easy to put back into the accompanying case. Although my carrying case looks different than what is pictured in the description, it still works fine. I bought the large ones & have taken them to the beach several times and they work great over the chairs. I also wrapped it around myself for awhile to provide lightweight protection when the beach was cold. Love the corner zippered pocket. Instructions state that they should NOT be put in the dryer - but they dry very quickly on their own.
customer_reviews.author: JMB

customer_reviews.title: It does what it needs to with a slight draw back
customer_reviews.text: Carrying a towel go the beach sucks. This is perfect for that. This folds to a towel a third of it's size while absorbing just as much, if not more. DO NOT USE FABRIC SOFTENER OR DRYER SHEETS ON ANY TOWEL, it prevents towels from absorbing water properly! The one small con I have with this towel is it's a tad bit "grippy". It doesn't glide across skin very well, and almost feels like it tugs on body hair. As a very hairy man, I wouldn't prefer to use it as a shower towel.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Ott

customer_reviews.title: Really happily surprised!
customer_reviews.text: This towel is huge!!! And it actually works! I hike, back pack, and make random outdoors outings that I need a towel and coverage to get changed. This towel does it all and dries fast. Haven't had any issues with mildew or any other smells. I wash it after every 4-5 uses. I am going to purchase some of the smaller sizes and some for my everyday towels. Tried many different ones, I really like this one. Was really surprised, especially at the price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was the BEST for my southeast Asia trip! - Unfortunately slips out of the pouch :(
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little towel, I bought the M, and it is compact. I did a Southeast Asia trip and this served as both my beach towel and sweat towel for walking around! Dries you amazingly fast. The pouch is great and makes the towel easy packing, however, I had it on a caribeener and after a hike I was so sad to find it had slipped out and I lost it for good :( I wanted to give this towel a 5 as it works really well, looks good, and utility can't be beat, but I wish the pouch sealed better...I have no towel now. Sad times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had gotten a bigger size. While ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had gotten a bigger size. While the medium was absorbent enough to dry my whole body and my hair, it was more work and the towel wasn’t big enough to wrap around my body - so for someone who’s more conservative it was always a little tricky trying to change into clothes when I was still drying. The size difference folded up isn’t big enough to warrant getting the smaller towel - so get a large or extra large. Treat yo self.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Pyatt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I’m fat, so my shower robe is really big & bulky, so for travelling —even in the rv— it is a pain. This little beauty folds up exactly as specified and shakesout to a size that covers all of me, absorbing all the water from a shower or a swim without even registering as wet. It dries completely in a few minutes. It has its own hallowed spot in th rv, and the family are begging for ones of their own. I am taking requuests by color :>
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: An absorbent, practical solution for a bulky beach towel.
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 of these towels to take with us on an overseas trip. We wanted a lightweight, packable, absorbent towel to carry in our suitcase and then transfer to our backpacks for a couple of ocean swims. This was the perfect choice. We got a medium-sized towel for each of us, and they were just the right size for our purpose. They were also useful as packing padding for breakables on the way home. They worked well and were super-absorbent. Now that we are home, I will probably keep one in my car for unexpected spills...
customer_reviews.author: SeekerOfGreatStories

customer_reviews.title: Great gym towel, but doesn't dry hair well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this towel to replace the bulky bath towel I was using to shower at the gym. It's a great product, very compact, and I would say it actually dries my body better than normal cotton bath towels. However, it is absolutely terrible at drying my hair (my hair is about 2-3" long). If your need for this towel doesn't involve anything related to hair, then this is a 5-star product. 24X48" size is perfect for post shower body drying. I use the smaller one during workouts and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Great Absorbency but really thin
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy and true Microfiber towel, but it feels a little more like a shammy to wash your car then a towel. I personally don't mind it but I know other would hate it. It's great for travel and it's absorbs an incredible amount of water. It's also truly large enough to be a good towel. I just see a lot of people not being able to get over the thiness of it and the feel of it. One of my friends like it alright, everyone else that tried it had issues. So it's all personal taste really I myself like it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt. Scott Rickert

customer_reviews.title: THIS TOWEL IS GREAT FOR EVERYTHING!!!
customer_reviews.text: This awesome towel works for everything. I keep one in the car and one in the house in my den. I can use it for almost everything. From wiping clean my glasses all the way to cleaning up a major spill and more. It is the perfect size and fits neatly into the small EDC bsg. It iis a must for me because it is absorbent and when you live in a warm place year round or for your hottest summer days, it is handy to soak up sweat too!!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M. Ahern

customer_reviews.title: Received As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Several bad reviews mention a strong chemical smell coming from their new towels. Mine didn’t have that. I opened the package, took the towel out and gave it a nice long sniff. A few sniffs actually. Kind of like your friend’s dog does to your crotch that makes you uncomfortable. No smell. Nothing. It’s also a lot softer than I expected, and thin for something so absorbent. By absorbent I mean more absorbent than expected. I got the 16x32 towel to wipe down my bike on wet mornings. According to my very unscientific method, this works perfectly. You could probably use it as a chamois if you needed to. Over all, will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lee J. Eden

customer_reviews.title: Right-Sized
customer_reviews.text: this is the second batch of microfiber travel towels we've purchased for our brand-new, incomplete "tramper." The first batch were the largest you could get - large enough for wrap-around modesty, but hard to keep off the floor if you are drying off in a communal bathroom at the camp site. I think I prefer these slightly smaller towels. At this size, there is enough towel to dry you completely, but not so much that there are still dry spots. It wraps around my big noggin to absorb moisture out of my hair, and they dry significantly better than a standard cotton towel. In short, we like them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the fast drying capability
customer_reviews.text: Okay, the microfiber for this towel is weird. Really really weird. The texture is very very smooth, much more than any other towel I have had, and I thought this was not microfibre. Umm, imagine a velvety texture that jewelry or glasses are wrapped in and this is that. The towel works well though (I am surprised), is a bit more rigid in structure than I would like, and is super absorbent. The only thing I would complain about maybe, is the borders are a bit textured more than I like. Yes, I have sensory issues. Great purchase over all. It is lightweight, how it holds upto travel, I guess, I will update next year.
customer_reviews.author: Mimansa Jaiswal

customer_reviews.title: Fast drying even in humidity.
customer_reviews.text: The best microfiber towel I have ever used. I recommend it to the advent individual to the traveler that wishes to travel light and carry efficient items. This should be in your bag. I camped in Panama in the jungle for 10days and the towel held up very well. Always dried quickly after each use and didnt over absorb water fron the body nor my long thick hair passed my shoulders. Mind you a wring excess water out before drying my hair. Above all, best purchase ever, I purchased the XL one and will be purchasing the larger one another time, I am 6ft tall, so it was the perfect size to fold, store, and use.
customer_reviews.author: Ecktor

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 2. Highly recommend as I'll probably order more..
customer_reviews.text: So.. this is the second towel that I've purchased from RainLeaf. The first one was for my boyfriend, and he said it was weird, but good weird. It's strange because it is so soft (but not like plush), and it works SO well. I'm able to dry off very quickly when showering at work, and it dries in a locker without getting funky. We purchased the large size, and it works well for both of us (he's 6'-6'1" and I'm 5'2"). We have orange and green, and the colors are just like the photo! I'm tempted to purchase more just so we have them on hand for camping, keeping one in the car, etc.
customer_reviews.author: nikkilessthan3

customer_reviews.title: Now bought two of these great towels
customer_reviews.text: I first bought a Rainleaf towel for a trip to the UK; I needed a just-in-case towel that was compact, light, and dried fast. Since then, I started using the towel when I exercise. The absorbency is fantastic. It is super-soft, and comfortable to wipe against my face, but not too soft. (I have another exercise towel by another brand that I never use because it gives me a touching-a-chalkboard icky feeling. No issues like that with Rainleaf's towel.) Plus, the cloth holds up if washed by hand or in the washing machine, and dries very fast, as promised. For this reason, I bought a 2nd towel in another color; I gotta say, I love the color selection, too.
customer_reviews.author: Beth L. Cato

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase; soft too!
customer_reviews.text: For a trip to Italy I wanted to be sure to have my own towel. I got the large and it’s perfect. I also use it at home on my hair as to avoid frizz and it works wonderfully. The purple is vibrant and the hanging hook is great too; dries almost instantly. It came with a square travel bag that it fits in well. Also will use it as a ‘blanket’ on a flight.
customer_reviews.author: JulesAnn

customer_reviews.title: Dries very fast
customer_reviews.text: I bought these under recommendation to find microfiber towels while living on a ship underway. That environment sees less than optimal airflow and hanging conditions and it's a constant struggle to keep things as sanitary as possible. That being said the biggest benefit of these towels is that they dry very fast. Regular terrycloth towels start to develop a mildew/mold odor after 2-3 days use and laundry is something that requires strategy while underway. These microfiber towels can easily be used daily for 3 weeks and not develop mildew or mold issues. I bought a pair but only needed to use one for 7 months of daily use and never noted any fading or wear and tear. Outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great Beach Vacation!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I each used an XXL and a L for our trip to Hawaii. They worked well and were odor free. We use the bigger ones to lay down as blankets on the sand and they were easy to shake off before folding back up into their dry pouches. The smaller ones were the perfect size to use to dry off. While they absorb a lot of the water they still feel slightly damp to the touch. The best feature was the snap and loop which we used to attach to our balcony furniture so they wouldn’t fly away while drying off between uses. Great for beach weekends and travel!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Owers

customer_reviews.title: Everything I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I cannot attest to the durability of this towel, but I used it for the first time yesterday and it was more absorbant than I expected, and it dried quickly! I really appreciate the size and how small it folds up! Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I had looked into a few different products before making this purchase. I bought 2 of these for myself and my husband. We had gone to Costa Rica and I wanted something we could use on an excursion in case it rained. They pack really well and I am so glad we brought them. It poured rain during a horseback riding excursion. We used these like capes/ponchos. While we still got wet, these towels definitely kept us from being soaked and freezing the way other riders were. And they did dry relatively quickly when I hung them outside, considering how soaked they were, and how humid the weather was. So, overall, I was very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: I recently traveled from MD to CA via airplane (for the 1st time) and I was nervous about only taking 2 carry-ons. We were staying in an AirBNB (also my 1st time) and I wasn't sure what the bath towel situation would be - plus I'm a little grossed out at the thought of using a stranger's bath towels for some reason (so much potential for yuck). This towel DRIES SO FAST it's unbelievable. It folds super small and comes with a little storage bag, making it super easy to travel with. I would definitely recommend this product if you're trying to travel light and stranger's towels give you the heebiejeebies!!! 11/10 would purchase again (and probably will).
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Great price for this item
customer_reviews.text: Some will say this is too large and heavy for backpacking. Well, jokes on them, I don't go further than 6 miles a day so this is really nice. I mainly used it on my last trip as a shoulder warmer. We had a lot of rain and sweat so my cloths were wet. Once we stopped to fish I changed into a dry top, put this over my shoulders, and then my thin rain/wind jacket on top. It was thick enough to keep me warm in the chilly rocky mountains at 10,000 feet in July. I used it to dry off the next day after a very chilly dip in the lake as well. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin P

customer_reviews.title: A must for travel  - when not staying at a resort
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son who was headed to Fiji on a service trip. He was headed no to the resorts but to the highlands where they had very little. When he came back he said it was one of the best items I had packed for him. It was lightweight and dried quickly. The best part was it was compact to fit into your suitcase unlike a real towel. Bringing another back can get very costly when traveling to Fiji
customer_reviews.author: Leslie F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this towel in an extra large. It served me well on two separate camping trips to bodies of water. It packs away so small and takes up minimal space in a two person tent. The towel's texture is a smooth microfiber material, similar to the cloths used to clean lenses, and it is surprisingly absorbent and fast-drying. The loop in the corner allows you to hang dry the towel easily or fasten it to a camping chair so it won't blow away. 10/10 would absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Really Does What It Says
customer_reviews.text: I found absolutely no overexaggeration or false advertisement with this product, and I was thrilled! It joined me in Europe for a month. It always dried quick, I only needed one or two passes over body parts to make them completely dry, and it folds down so thin and neat. I got the towel in the army green-ish color and my only complaint is that the spots that are wet really show. Why does this matter? ... The beach. Yes, if you sit down with a wet bathing suit, you'll have a GIANT *** print on it. That was a bit awkward. Just be mindful, haha.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Camille

customer_reviews.title: Very compact towel! Will be ordering one again!
customer_reviews.text: Are used this towel for my trip to Hawaii. It was absolutely perfect, very compact and I deal for what I was doing, it would fit right in in my small backpack and dry in a very small amount of time. I also like the fact that it comes with a pouch for is your storage and so it doesn’t get your other items wet. Remember to look at the sizes when purchasing to make sure that you don’t order the one that is too small or too big! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Met my needs perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have a need for small towels like these to for personal reasons and the work perfectly. I love the material and now that I see how nice the material is I think I can also use these towels when I am out in the sun to keep cool. I use to have a coolsit towel that I would soak in water and it would stay very cool on my skin around my neck when I played golf. I am quite sure I will be able to use these towels in the same way. I am looking forward to the warm weather when i can give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Meadors

customer_reviews.title: Very absorbent, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We took 2 of these towels overseas recently. One of the places we used them was the Dead Sea. We had heard of people not being able to wash or rinse all the minerals out of the towels they used there and ended up throwing them away. We didn't have any problem! Took these towels into the shower to give them a quick wash and rinse and by the next morning they were clean, dry and ready to pack. These were perfect for travel, but will be great for future beach and camping trips. So glad we bought them!
customer_reviews.author: Hangin@Home

customer_reviews.title: So it isn't terry cloth, it works!
customer_reviews.text: I think a lot of people believe a beach towel must be terry cloth. Do they even know how much sand that picks up? When it gets wet and yucky, it stinks! It's heavy. Not so with this Rainleaf super absorbent big micro-fiber towel!!! It's amazing! It's very lightweight, so year you'll have to anchor it down at the beach, but one quick shake and the sand is all out of it! It really does dry my skin thoroughly and the towel dries quickly so it never smells nasty. I love this for my pool, traveling in my RV, and for the beach. It's really an efficient towel.
customer_reviews.author: Trudi

customer_reviews.title: Mind blowing and confusing product all at the same time
customer_reviews.text: Mind blowing because of it's absobancy, and quick drying speed.. Truly amazing! The confusion comes from actual use. In a way, it's like drying off with a squeegy. I immediately missed the fluffy towel i'm so used to...but that thought was immediately replaced by how amazingly it got the water off me. More amazed when like ...15 to 20 minutes later the towel felt almost perfectly dry! I still miss the fluff but can't knock this microfiber towel's efficiency. Winner in my book! Perfect for beach, camping, and swimming!
customer_reviews.author: Sock Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: I washed these before using them, and not only did they bleed purple dye everywhere (my bad; I should have washed them on their own the first time), but the stitching around the edges on 3 of the 4 towels started unraveling. They do a decent job of drying things, but they leave a ton of lint behind. Microfiber is usually great for cleaning eyeglasses, but these left so much lint behind that I actually thought my glasses had been horribly scratched until I cleaned them again with something else. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These towels are awesome. I use to use a "samie" back in the day when I was on the swim team. These are very similar..pretty thin would prob like it a little better if it was a little thicker. However, I purchased these towels for the floor in front of the kids shower and also to dry off the dog when he gets wet. They work so much better then regular towels. Pick up water fast and dry super quick. I was also afraid that the dog hair would stick to it and be gross....but that doesnt even happen...they have a little circular hoop on one corner which is great to hang up and dry even quicker!
customer_reviews.author: present

customer_reviews.title: Very portable, great for travel
customer_reviews.text: The microfiber fabric is soft but not plush, almost feels like a thicker version of eyeglass cleaner cloth. Dry yourself by blotting the water rather than rubbing yourself dry. The towel itself does dry quick and the loop to hang it was useful. The carrying bag not as useful, easier to roll towel up to take up less space in suitcase. Nice that it comes in many different colors - we ordered a different one for everyone in the family. They are big - make sure you check the size you are ordering. These were light and easy to carry on our hikes and allowed us to be comfortable after swimming.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Great for the gym
customer_reviews.text: Not rushing to replace all my cotton bathroom towels, but these are great for the gym. Lightweight, quick-drying, and I've had no issues with color bleeding. The large wasn't quite big enough to wrap around me and walk around modestly (I'm 5'9"), so I use that for my long hair and bought another, size XL, for the rest of me. Right after using this I feel like there's a thin layer of moisture left behind, but by the time I get dressed I'm fine.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: We are an active/athletic family. Some days we each take two showers due to exercising. We switched a couple years ago from standard bath towels to microfiber towels due to the need for quick drying times. These are solid towels and I would get the same brand over when we need new ones.
customer_reviews.author: inayat2012 on youtube

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great until the Hang Snap Loop Broke!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to go with the Rainleaf Microfiber Towel after much research and reading reviews. I purchased it primarily as a travel towel. I've taken it on probably 4 international trips and it's worked fabulous. I didn't have any issues with the smell, color running, or the edge stitching. It's super absorbent, very lightweight, and I used the Snap Loop quite a bit to let it hang and quickly dry. In my opinion it was very functional and totally worth the money.... That was until the Hang Snap Loop broke. Now I can't find a way to contact the seller and I've had the blanket less than 1 year. Disappointed to say the least...
customer_reviews.author: Norique J Robles

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping
customer_reviews.text: We used these when camping. Get the large one. Not much more space and easier to use. They don't feel luxurious like a fleece towel, but once you get used to blotting more than rubbing water, you see it really works.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kreis

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Dried me up and didn’t even feel wet afterwards. I still hung it up for a while while I got ready and then put it away and it folds up so small and thin, you wouldn’t even think you got a towel that big in the little bag it comes in. Seriously. When I got it I was like “wait what size did I get, I thought I got the big one” lol then I took it out and looked at it and was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great travel towel super aborbent
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big bloke who likes bath sheets so I bought the biggest size. I wasn't disapointed, it's huge. Exactly what I wanted. I just got back from a month work trip to the tropics and this towel worked perfectly. I even used it to modestly change into my swim shorts at the beach one day and that worked well. On the last morning I grabbed a shower and dried off. I was able to pack my towel and travel immediately after taking my shower and it hardly felt wet at all and certainly didn't soak the rest of the contents of my duffel bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small, light, and not really a towel.
customer_reviews.text: I mean....it's small and light? Its not really a towel, more a giant sunglasses cloth. But, I guess it works for a little water or sweat. (hint don't jump in the pool expecting to use this)
customer_reviews.author: Harrison Gordon

customer_reviews.title: great travel towel
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful travel towel. It’s not super absorbent but it works pretty well. It folds up very small. I got the large which is the size of an average to large bath towel. I can wrap it around myself like a bath towel. Honestly, I could have gotten the medium and it would have been just fine. I’m planning to get a few of the really big ones to use as beach towels.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: It is a good towel, does what you need it to in ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a good towel, does what you need it to in a small space for a short period of time. It takes multiple washes to get the mildew/sweat or w/e smell out of it after 1 use. I keep it and just wash it multiple times. It is worth it for the space savings.
customer_reviews.author: James Antikythera

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: These towels are amazing! We purchased some based on a friend's recommendation and we were very happy we did. We were traveling to an island where we planned to spend a great deal of time in the ocean. The towels are really compact so they took up very little space in our luggage. They are also light so adding them to the dive bag took up little space and added little weight. They are very absorbent and dry very quickly. We could even use them to brush off sand and the sand shook out of the towel easily. I was initially apprehensive about purchasing these due to the price, but they are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m buying three more
customer_reviews.text: I tested this out for my dog since he has disgusting hair like a swiffer had he’ll spawn with a mop. Super absorbent, quick drying, and light! I’m keeping this one in my car and buying three more for camping; one for me, one for my partner, and another for the dog
customer_reviews.author: dahowlers

customer_reviews.title: Best quick drying towel ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best towel for camping. It rained a ton on our last trip and this towrl was great. It dried us off and I hung it from the gear loft inside our tent. By morning it was dry and ready to use. I plan on buying one for everyone in the family. The kids hung it off their backpack after swimming and it dried in no time. Extremely lightweight and packs up super small. It would work well for backpacking and any kind of travel. The quality was great. Even the bag it comes with for storage was seen well. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LoveGodAboveAll

customer_reviews.title: Rainleaf Microfiber Towel Perfect Travel & Sports & Beach Towel
customer_reviews.text: I was dissatisfied with the and the Aquis Original Microfiber Hair Towel, 19 x 39 inches and the DuraComfort Essentials Super Absorbent Anti-Frizz Microfiber Hair Towel, Large 41 x 19-Inches. They were too small and, until I used the Rainleaf Microfiber Towel Perfect Travel & Sports & Beach Towel, 24 x 48 inches, realized they weren't quite as absorbent or fast drying. Very pleased with the Rainleaf Microfiber Towel Perfect Travel & Sports & Beach Towel.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Dries quickly, sturdy and thick.
customer_reviews.text: I kept this towel in my hiking/day bag. I used it after a dip in a thermal pool and it got my whole body dry super fast! It was mildly damp but not so much that I couldn’t put it back in my bag without it ruining the other items in there. Completely dried very quickly once I draped it over the back of a chair. Very compact...fit in a small pocket of my day bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a microfiber towel!!!!!!!!!!!! This seller is EXTREMELY misleading. Microfiber consists of literal microfiber, similar to what one is to use to buff a car with, meaning actual raised plush fiber, not some flat garbage. Very disappointed!!!! This is like a thin paper towel, absolute garbage!!!!!!! It has the consistency of pillow case instead of an actual microfiber towel. Whack!
customer_reviews.author: No Jov

customer_reviews.title: Durable, large, no odors!
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses these in his gym bag. They fold and fit well, but are amazingly large. I tried these because other sport towels develop an odor after awhile. These do not. Regularly washed now for about two years, they look brand new. They dry easily, have no pills or flaws, marks, or wear. They do not give off lint when drying, with the fabric being smooth and tight. I recommend them and would purchase these towels again.
customer_reviews.author: LLLL

customer_reviews.title: Works well and dries quickly
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't feel like a regular towel, but does the job and dries quickly. You can dry it really quickly by placing it near the windshied of a car and running the defroster. This is of course assuming that it's fair weather and you have the windows open. Anyother key feature is there is a loop to use to hang it on a bush or whatever if you're not driving. It is also very lightweight if you're flying or hiking. If you're headed to Europe and staying in discount hotels that don't provide towels, Formula 1, the largest of these chains, sells a similar one for half the money.
customer_reviews.author: Wil

customer_reviews.title: The perfect travel and beach towel
customer_reviews.text: I've been forced to buy a second one since my fiance kept stealing my other one. We absolutely love these. They're so small and compact so we bring them when we travel abroad and go camping. I bought the largest size, which is great for sitting on for picnics or sitting on the beach. The large size has the added bonus of the zipped pocket that will conceal your valuables while you're in the water. That feature alone makes the larger size worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: large enough to cover your body, lightweight, fits in carry on, functional.
customer_reviews.text: took this to costa rica for a lightweight back up towel that would fit in my carry on. I took it to swim in a waterfall, dried off, and wore it around my waist as a cover up. My friends thought I was wearing a skirt. it was very soft, and plenty big enough without using up too much space in my luggage. washed well. Really perfect for what I expected of it. Will plan to take it hiking/camping as well. Recommend. Update: I liked it so much, (and so did my sister) so I just bought her one as a gift in a different color. Great gift for travelers and those who like to camp one work out!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Bathroom floor is BONE dry after shower...
customer_reviews.text: I could not avoid creating puddles of water on the bathroom floor after showering. I wanted something light, something durable, and something that I could wash in the washing machine. This is perfect. Absorbs water quickly, doesn't hold a scent (not moldy, no mildew...) and dries super fast. Very satisfied. Makes bath time enjoyable. Would recommend to others and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Giggles

customer_reviews.title: Good towel
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Fits in luggage without taking much room! I also use this for the Y given it is not bulky for my bag. It dries you well but not like a terry towel you need to “pat” yourself dry. It’s also great for drying your hair! Large enough to wrap yourself after the shower.
customer_reviews.author: KSpehar

customer_reviews.title: Alright product, but nothing wrong with a regular towel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this towel because I travel a lot of work and visit a different locations and use the fitness facilities and don't always have towels there and or don't always trust them. So I purchased this towel so I would always have one. I received the towel and went on a business trip and decided to give it a shot and was not at all impressed. I have had regular hotel towels that I've acquired over the years and they were better this towel. long story short save your money, wish I would of
customer_reviews.author: Josh Davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Iceland
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect to have on hand during my trip to Iceland. I didn’t want to cart around a heavy, soggy towel on my Golden Circle tour and visit to the lagoon, and this did the trick. It wrings out well and dries very quickly. Even when it feels wet, it still continues to absorb. I bought one for my husband too, but often a single towel was sufficient for both of us. Now with a little one, I’m really glad to have this to toss into my diaper bag for cleanup. It’s soft and keeps its texture and color after several washes and exposure to salt water. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: RachaelC

customer_reviews.title: All you need
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I took this with me on a week-long car camping trip where I was staying at campgrounds with shower facilities. The large size is all the towel I need since it dries the water off me as soon as I apply it to my skin. It's pretty amazing. The towel has a hanging loop which was very handy. After I would use it, I would drape it over some things in the back of my SUV and it was dry in no time. It takes up almost no room and weighs nothing. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Multitasker!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect on-the-go item for travel with kids, you never know when you'll need clean-up help - or in our current case, with the summer heat, when a splash pad or a puddle will temp a little one at the park. I also spilled a large thermos of water in my car & this became a lifesaver as it was within reach. Just wish I'd ordered a larger size, though I love the diaper bag portability of this one. Will likely purchase for future gifts.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Great to use and and dries fast!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two towels for my indoor cycling sessions. they absorb the sweat very well and after each ride, i ring them out in the shower and they dry super fast in the air. Much better to use than a regular towel. Highly recommend and easily to travel with - they come in a nice pouch that you can put in your suitcase - there are a variety of sizes but i like mine so far!
customer_reviews.author: Furnace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel beach towel
customer_reviews.text: We got 2 of the extra large for a week trip to Hawaii. Used them every day, super lightweight and better than the bulky hotel beach towels. They held up, no unraveling, tears or anything. Definitely needed a wash when we got home, cold water and hung dry. Sort of wish we had a few smaller ones for drying off, while these ones were mostly our sand barrier and for laying on.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Buying again
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best towels I have ever owned ! I love the absorbency and quick dry rate, and for someone who has thick curly hair almost down to her knees, this towel helps dry my hair fast with less frizz and damage to my hair :). Would definitely recommend the biggest size for body or hair :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley F.

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling and doing excursions like river rafting or kayaking, where you have to dry off enough to change clothes and jump back into the car. It doesnt dry you off 100% like a fluffy bath towel, but it definitely gets you close enough to where youre not soaking your clothes (unless you have long hair). Not a snuggly soft towel, but you shouldnt expect it to be. Great space saver to take on trip instead of a bulky beach towel!
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Packs small but covers big
customer_reviews.text: As a full figured gal, it is annoying to walk around the locker room in the typical gym provided towel. This is about the size of my bath blanket at home, but easier to pack in my gym bag and lighter than a regular towel. It’s not magic and not quite as absorbent as my bath towels, but more than makes up in portability. It also dries more quickly. I hang up at night when I get home and it’s dry to pack in the morning. I bought a second just so I could rotate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super handy for travel
customer_reviews.text: It was a little weird to use because it doesn't "feel" like a towel, but it does work great to dry you off. Definitely drise fast--ready to pack again by the time you are done getting dressed. Can't beat the size and weight for packing. Also double great as an impromptu picnic "blanket" or as a lightweight cover if the plane is too cold. All in all came in very handy on our trip. Bought the large and felt like it was a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You’ll be skeptic at first, but it really is great!
customer_reviews.text: When you first feel the towel, you’ll be skeptical. You’ll think it feels like a tablecloth and expect it to just smear the water. However, it really does absorb the water! It’s almost like the water disappears. It folds pretty thin and I keep it in my backpack for work. Which makes me feel confident it’s great for traveling. I’m an aspiring minimalist, and I saw this towel on a YouTube video about minimalism. It really is a towel to end all towels!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Aaron Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Best Towel Ever
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the BEST towel ever!! Love the microfiber on my skin, the towel is enormous, perfect for a BBW like myself. It folds up and has a sweet carrying case. I find this to be better in hotel rooms because it dries so fast so I fold and pack it with my clothes. It washes/dries easy too. I’ve even used this as a lightweight blanket. I love this towel so much I bought a smaller one for drying my hair. I feel like a queen in these towels 💜
customer_reviews.author: Amarosa Creative

customer_reviews.title: 2+ years and going strong
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great reliable towel for over two years for me. That said, it's time for a new one. It used to last about two weeks of use before it started to smell at all (great for long camping trips). I can go about 5 days to a week now before needing to wash it. If it had some antimicrobial coating, after two years it's washed away. Not a problem, for the price it can't complain one bit.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: A great travel buddy to have with you!
customer_reviews.text: I have been putting this towel to the test. I have taken it on my travels and by far it hasn't disappointed me. I took it with me on my trip to Hawaii and on a camping trip and on a kayak trip. The size and the absorbency and the quick dry features all worked very well on every one of these trips. I bought two sizes of this towel I have one of the smaller ones and one of the larger ones and both are still very compact. The larger one has a place to put your keys actually in the towel itself on the corner there's a zipper where you can place your items. What a great design.
customer_reviews.author: Miss J

customer_reviews.title: Works so Well
customer_reviews.text: I had to get naked in Iceland, to shower before entering Fontana Spa. Yes, I am a silly American with body issues, so this towel was very useful. I got undressed, walked with the towel to the showers, bathed, then put on my suit, and headed to the pool. It dries so quick! It was lovely to have on hand, and it covered my entire body. Once I put it through the spinner, it was totally dry! Love this towel!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great travel towel!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased 2 of these towels for a trip to hawaii. I wanted to take a towel with me for going to the beach or climbing to some of the falls. This towel is very light weight and comes with a convenient pouch. It worked like a charm when I needed to use it. I would just dry off with it and wring it out then use it again and it a sorbed a surprising amount of water each time. I would only wring it out once, maybe, if I was still dripping wet. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I tried 6+ different 'travel', 'lightweight', 'super absorbant' towels. This was by far my favorite, especially for travel. It was not the plushest or most ansorbant...but so packable, and so convenient. It packed the smallest, but was in fact the largest towel (by dimensions, not thickness). I used it as a blanket, on the plane. As a towel when I needed, and as a beach towel to lay on, while at the beach. I will buy 3 more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle K.

customer_reviews.title: Wash often as soon as possible after use!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I dislike is that even when I tried to keep it dry after use it still seemed to smell a little bit like mold. It works well though and I use it when I have to shower at the gym. I think it would have been better to actually use a washer and dryer after every use as soon as I was done. Some days I didn’t get home until late night so I would wash it the next day.. not sure why but I can’t seem to get the smell out. Maybe I’m doing something wrong but I didn’t see any clear instructions on what to do for care.
customer_reviews.author: Nate pena

customer_reviews.title: I totally love this towel
customer_reviews.text: I totally love this towel, and it was an excellent buy. Will be using it often, for travel and camping. I got the Large, should have gotten the largest size (XL). While the Large did the work, bigger is always better and since is so compacted I doubt it would take much more space than the Large. The towel dried really fast. The little bag/pouch it comes in is excellent; you use the towel, hang to dry if there is time, and folds neatly and easily to fit in its pouch. Packed it and ready to go again. I might even buy a couple for use at home. Yes, they are that good.
customer_reviews.author: Chary

customer_reviews.title: Feels like cold leather
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work. Sounded great. Light weight, easy to dry etc. But I tried it at home first and it was horrible. Felt like I was using cold leather to dry myself. Not soft and I can not imagine how it would pick things up on a beach (I got the XL) or anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Bennett

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Towel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this towel for camping and going to the beach. It is super compact and takes a lot less space than a normal towel this size would. I was so impressed with how absorbent it was. It was perfect for the beach. The towel is smooth and doesn’t have the same texture as a regular towel. When sand got on the towel I could easily brush it off. It dries you off amazingly well and dries quickly too. So far I haven’t found one complaint yet about this towel! I keep loving it more and more!
customer_reviews.author: Videl50million

customer_reviews.title: huge and compact at the same time
customer_reviews.text: I got this to stuff in my gym bag to take up as little space as possible and to dry quickly. It has lived up to expectations. I got the beach towel size and it is huge but folds down nicely. It's a chamois so it's not the same as towling off with a nice soft cotton towel but the sacrifice is for compactness, absorbancy, and quick drying. I didn't realize at the time I bought it that it also has a corner pocket to put wallet/keys in at the beach if you're comfortable leaving them that way. I figure a crook knows to check my shoe but probably not a hidden pocket in the towel.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Ditch the terry cloth towels.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought one of these towels to put in my bug out bag for use in a crisis. If I had to evacuate and end up in a shelter I wanted to be prepared. Now there's this nasty virus floating around and going to a public laundromat is definitely not something I want to do. These towels can be hand washed and they will dry quickly. Perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Always hot

customer_reviews.title: Was unsure, but I love it
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't know what to expect. I had never used this type of towel before. I really love it. It dries me off better than a regular towel, and dries out really quickly. I tried this because we had issues with our towels not drying out in our bathroom, and it always annoyed me. It is a bit of an adjustment to not have the same feel of the thick towel you are used to, but given how much better it dries me off after a shower, I prefer it.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin R. Taylor
